item.description:
"The Last Intervention" was shot in Hartford last year. I am in it in a minor (extra) role and have been assured that I did not end up on the cutting room floor. The film is a comedy about a woman whose family decides she needs an intervention about perceived drug use. Come see Hartford's neighborhoods from a different perspective.

Their is a Opening Party at at 6:00 with a cash bar. The cast and crew will be there with a Q & A afterwards. The film is at 7:00 pm. There is a suggested donation of $5.00
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the downstairs lobby.
item.name: The Last Intervention-Hartford Premiere
